pkgmetadata.longdescription: A library of utilities for big.matrix objects of package bigmemory. // This package extends the bigmemory package with various analytics. Functions bigkmeans and binit may also be used with native R objects. For tapply-like functions, the bigtabulate package may also be helpful. For linear algebra support, see bigalgebra. For mutex (locking) support for advanced shared-memory usage, see synchronicity.
